sign_description: Sign in to your account to access the main page
sign_up_description: Sign up for an account to access the main page
onboarding_slide1_title: Welcome to Pinely React Native Template
onboarding_slide1_description: This template will help you quickly start developing an application on React Native
onboarding_slide2_description: Use ready components for quick and easy development of the application. They are located in the src/core/ui folder
onboarding_slide3_description: This architecture allows you to quickly and easily scale your application. Follow, test and debug. Click the floating button to open the debugger
onboarding_slide4_description: Enjoy developing your application with our modular S.A.I architecture
